items.name: Kicking off the planting season in Limburg with BLG!

fields.event-name: Kicking off the planting season in Limburg with BLG!
fields.event_details: We will be planting trees with our partner BLG at Landgoed Geijsteren in Limburg. Our morning event will start with an introduction to reforestation and it's importance in fighting climate change, which we will conduct together with our planting partner Bosgroepen. Afterwards we will spend the rest of the morning to help Landgoed Geijsteren with their tree planting project!

items.name: Morning tree planting event with EY

fields.event-name: Morning tree planting event with EY
fields.event_details: During this morning event with EY we will be restoring an area that used to be monoculture forest and that was devastated by disease. We will start with an introduction on reforestation, why it is important and why we need to create a biodiverse forest on this location specifically. Afterwards, we will be working the rest of the morning to help create this new forest!

items.name: Big Family Planting in Las Rozas 2024

fields.event-name: Big Family Planting in Las Rozas 2024
fields.event_details:
The first open event of the European Tree Planting Day was a massive success! Around 1200 people participated not only in the ecological restoration of the area, but could also enjoy the cultural shows and environmental workshops that were held by the Las Rozas City Hall.

Our fourth year of collaboration in a row, and making it more successfull and unique every time! Thanks to all participants and the Las Rozas municipality for the amazing job!
fields.subscription_instructions: People can join freely by attending the event during the designated hours. It starts at 10:00am and lasts for around 5 hours. Find more information in the Las Rozas Municipality webpage: https://www.lasrozas.es/node/10799

items.name: Training young Terra Leaders in Las Rozas

fields.event-name: Training young Terra Leaders in Las Rozas
fields.event_details:
The planting activity was a great success! A sunny day was the perfect environment to train these young volunteers, who assisted the Great Family Planting of Las Rozas 2024 and helped not only to pleant but also to tag the trees.

Great job! We hope to see you again in the field soon.

items.name: Planting with the Green Helmets Project in Las Rozas

fields.event-name: Planting with the Green Helmets Project in Las Rozas
fields.event_details:
This upcoming event in Las Rozas will unite Amazon employees and students from School Zola Las Rozas for a collaborative tree-planting initiative as part of the Cascos Verdes (Green Helmets) project, supported by Amazon. Inspired by the UN Blue Helmets, Cascos Verdes encourages citizens to take action for sustainability through reforestation and ecosystem restoration efforts.

During the event, volunteers will receive an introduction to the importance of tree planting and ecosystem protection, followed by a hands-on planting session. Participants will learn practical techniques, such as tree staking and protection, while engaging in meaningful environmental work. The day will conclude with an interactive environmental walk, designed to educate and inspire volunteers about local ecosystems and sustainability practices.

This initiative not only contributes to environmental restoration but also promotes education and awareness around climate change and ecosystem management.

items.name: Adyen Paris tree planting event

fields.event-name: Adyen Paris tree planting event
fields.event_details:
Life Terra now offers the unique opportunity to plant trees close to Paris. The 14th century castle “Ferme de Chateaupers” in Roinville is the venue where we'll be planting nearly 5,000 trees to help restore the land. The goal of the events is to plant a diverse mix of plant species inside and around the farm’s boundaries, as well as in some crop-field margins, to create windbreaks, biodiversity hubs, and new orchards.

The plantings will also be used to create “green infrastructure” to connect different pockets of forest and thus reconnect habitats. This will reinforce local biodiversity and enhance the resilience of the local ecosystem to extreme climatic events.

We'll kick off this project with the help of Adyen's Paris team, making France the 6th country (after Netherlands, Spain, Italy, UK and Sweden) for this internationally operating payment platform specialist. Let's plant!

items.name: NVIDIA Tree Planting Day

fields.event-name: NVIDIA Tree Planting Day
fields.event_details: We are going to restore a forest area in order to contribute to Germany's ongoing silviculture conversion towards stronger climate resiliency. At this specific event, NVIDIANs from the Munich office have the opportunity to be part of Life Terra’s mission, planting trees with their colleagues and making a direct positive impact.

items.name: One Tree Planted event with DLL near Den Bosch

fields.event-name: One Tree Planted event with DLL near Den Bosch

items.name: Avenue of Freedom'24

fields.event-name: Avenue of Freedom'24
fields.event_details: The new Avenue of Freedom will be established on Saturday, November 9th, in the Broumov region, where persecution of clergy from all over Czechoslovakia was concentrated during the previous communist regime. In the 1950s, an internment camp for priests and monks from various orders was set up in the local Benedictine monastery. By planting the Avenue of Freedom, we will commemorate the past and express our respect for those who suffered and fought for our freedom.

items.name: ABN AMRO tree planting event at Mariënwaerdt

fields.event-name: ABN AMRO tree planting event at Mariënwaerdt
fields.event_details: During this event ABN AMRO will be planting trees at the beautiful estate of Mariënwaerdt. After an introduction on how to plant a tree and why it is important to plant a tree, the ABN AMRO employees will be helping to reforest an area that has been devastated by ash die-back. By planting a mix of endemic species, the area will restore more quickly and be more resilient to such deceases in future.

items.name: Ecological restoration continues in Santa Clara a Velha

fields.event-name: Ecological restoration continues in Santa Clara a Velha
fields.event_details:
The Ecological Restoration of Santa Clara a Velha area, Odemira Municipality (Portugal), has been active since 2022. As of today more than 80 hectares have been restored with over 65.000 native trees!

This former exhausted eucalyptus monoculture is being transformed into a biodiverse food forest using a mixture of native species and allowing natural regeneration to happen, while creating local job opportunities.

The local fauna seems to enjoy it as well, as wildhogs have been actively eating the first pine nuts and wild strawberries. It is foreseen to plant 7.500 extra plants to make up for the damage these animals have caused.

The fact that local fauna is attracted to the new ecological niche is a great indicator of success, but we have to keep taking care of the trees during their first years. Lets remember that maintenance is as important as a proper implementation effort!

items.name: Viada Myliu miska planting

fields.event-name: Viada Myliu miska planting
fields.event_details: Myliu Miską is organising a tree planting event to help green our local area and promote environmental sustainability! Together, we’ll plant trees, restore nature, and make a lasting positive impact for future generations.

items.name: Tree Planting at Naranjas del Carmen organic farm

fields.event-name: Tree Planting at Naranjas del Carmen organic farm
fields.event_details: The professional team of Naranjas del Carmen, an organic farm near Valencia, will plant a mixture of trees and shrubs to diversify the existing species and boost agrodiversity and biodiversity. This initiative aims to implement regenerative agriculture practices to enhance resilient ecosystems within and around the farm.

items.name: Miyawaki Forest Planting, ELTE Dormitory Nagytétényi út

fields.event-name: Miyawaki Forest Planting, ELTE Dormitory Nagytétényi út
fields.event_details:
For our 5th birthday we "wished for" a Miyawaki forest and with the help of over sixty ambassadors and countless donors, the money was raised for the planting.

As promised, the Birthday Miyawaki will take place in the front garden of the Elte College on Nagytétényi Road, between 10 a.m and 1 p.m. on October 19, Saturday.

And it will be a double celebration, because we will plant 2 Miyawaki forests that day, because the money for another Miyawaki was raised thanks to the Lean Enterprise Institute Hungary and the ESG Association

We will bring everything you need for the planting and we will be waiting for you with coffee and cookies.

Besides the planting, there will also be a treasure hunt game for young and old, playhouse, free seedling distribution, T-shirt giveaway.

items.name: Mapletree planting event near Warsaw

fields.event-name: Mapletree planting event near Warsaw
fields.event_details: Mapletree will be planting trees near Warsaw together with Life Terra in their European wide efforts to support reforestation.

items.name: ADAX

fields.event-name: ADAX
fields.event_details: Adax is joining tree planting even for the second time already!

items.name: MIYA forest e.V. Tiny Forest in Rüsselsheim, Germany

fields.event-name: MIYA forest e.V. Tiny Forest in Rüsselsheim, Germany
fields.event_details:
We will plant a high-diverse Tiny Forest in Rüsselsheim with about 660 native trees and shrubs on an area of about 220 sqm.

Together with children from the nearby school, their parents, teachers and other volunteers we gonna have a great planting day!

Start is 8.30 am and it goes until the last tree is planted, so maybe until 5.30 pm.
fields.subscription_instructions: If you want to participate please write an email to info@miya-forest.de with the subject "Tiny Forest in Rüsselsheim". We will then provide you with all the necessary information :)

items.name: there for trees - Planting with kids in Domat/Ems

fields.event-name: there for trees - Planting with kids in Domat/Ems
fields.event_details: Neu Bepflanzung von einer Brachfläche mit Wolliger Schneeball, Pfaffenhütche, Sanddorn, Eingriffliger Weissdorn und vielen weiteren Pflanzen. Insgesmat werden an zwei Tagen 500 Sträucher und Bäume gepflanz. Ausserdem werden Neophyten bekämpft.
